sentences: Darin Zanyar (born 2 June 1987), known simply as Darin, is a Kurdish-Swedish singer-songwriter born in Stockholm.
section: N/A

sentences: He is one of Sweden's best-selling artists, with seven number one albums.

sentences: Darin had spent time in the US working with worldwide known producers and songwriters such as Jim Beanz, The Jackie Boyz, Victoria "Lady V" Horn to make the album.

sentences: Exit.

sentences: In May 2013 a new single entitled "So Yours" was released in Europe due to a performance as the interval act during the second semi-final of the Eurovision Song Contest 2013 in Malmö.
section: == Life and career == | === 2013: Exit ===

sentences: In mid 2013, Darin travelled to the Philippines to film the documentary En resa för livet together with SOS Children's Villages and three other artists, Eagle-Eye Cherry, Sophie Zelmani and Uno Svenningsson to bring attention to the poverty in the country and also try to gain and collect as many sponsors as possible for the children in the children's villages.

sentences: It was the first time he recorded a song with only acoustic instruments, which gave the production a different sound to what he had before.

sentences: The lyrics was an autobiographical story about his childhood and growing up in the 1990s.

sentences: The single went 4x platinum and was the most streamed song in Swedish that year.

sentences: The album Fjärilar i magen was released in September 2015 by Darin's own record company Dex Music and became his sixth number one album in Sweden.

== Other collaborations ==

sentences: Other collaborations ==
section: == Other collaborations ==

sentences: As well as being a successful performer, Darin is also an established songwriter
section: == Other collaborations ==

sentences: In 2007, Leona Lewis covered Darin's ballad "Homeless" for her debut album Spirit.
section: == Other collaborations ==

sentences: In 2009, "Love Struck", a song co-written by Darin and David Jassy, became the first official single for the American boyband V Factory.
section: == Other collaborations ==

sentences: In June 2010, Darin was asked by Swedish broadcaster SVT to record a specially written song "Can't Stop Love" for the Royal Wedding of Princess Victoria and Daniel Westling.
section: == Other collaborations ==

sentences: In 2010, the song "Foolish" originally recorded for the album Lovekiller was recorded by Shayne Ward for his album Obsession.
section: == Other collaborations ==

sentences: Darin wrote the Idol 2011 winner song All This Way for eventual winner Amanda Fondell.
section: == Other collaborations ==

sentences: Darin wrote a song called "Turn It Up", originally on the track list for Lovekiller, but gave it to the British girl group, A Girl Called Alice.
section: == Other collaborations ==

sentences: Darin co-wrote the song "Under The Radar" with Tony Nilsson and Teddy Sky.
section: == Other collaborations ==

sentences: It was the first single for the artist Qpid.
section: == Other collaborations ==

sentences: In October 2011, it was announced that Darin was involved in writing a new song for Swedish singer Eddie Razaz, titled "Let Me In".
section: == Other collaborations ==
